position: Senior Manager Analytics, DTDC Express Limited | Mastercard | IIT Kharagpur '23 | Major - Chemical Engineering | Minor - Computer Science and Engineering

experience.title: Senior Manager Analytics - Operations
experience.description: As a senior manager I am responsible for leveraging technology to improve our logistics operations. I am currently working on the Geo-spatial analysis of delivery areas to reduce vacant pincodes using Data Analytics and Python scripting. I am also looking into the product design of the version 2 of our chatbot assistant on MyDTDC application.
experience.description_html: As a senior manager I am responsible for leveraging technology to improve our logistics operations. I am currently working on the Geo-spatial analysis of delivery areas to reduce vacant pincodes using Data Analytics and Python scripting. I am also looking into the product design of the version 2 of our chatbot assistant on MyDTDC application. <!---->

experience.title: Data Engineer
experience.description: As a Data Engineer Intern at Mastercard, I worked on live client projects. I was responsible for processing millions of transaction data using their in-built Test and Learn platform and SQL scripting. I got hands on experience of the ETL processes and developer tools like Git and Jira.  I automated the data pipeline and streamlined the data processing steps to a one-click action button. I also got the opportunity to interact and work with the team of South Korea and Chile. I was also given a pre-placement offer based on my internship work.
